channel.title: How to make money as a non-member?
channel.description: so i just got my lvl 75 back with all this member shit and armor but i aunt wont get me my membership again and i need know how to get atleast like 100-200k. ive tried cows, chickens, hobgoblins.

item.title: How to make money as a non-member?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

towriss:

actually i think ima bot rune essence been doing it and its pretty good

^ Good idea.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make money as a non-member?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

If you wanna make a shit load of cash, the way I used to do it when I played in f2p was Smith steel bars. Though this method is - in order to make money, you have to have money…

It’s recommended to have cash, otherwise its very slow at the begining … Just buy coal and iron if that’s right? can’t remember… but buy alot of them, then smith them. Sell em, make somewhat high profit.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make money as a non-member?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

If you are going to do this legit do the following.
Combat related.
-Kill Cows
-Kill Hill Giants
-Kill Moss Giants

(Collect their bones, they are valuable)

Skill Related.
-Mine iron in Fallador Mining Cave
-Fish Lobster or Swordfish
-Woodcut Yews
-Mine Rune Essence

If you are going to bot it, then basicly do all the same, but BOT it…

Read full topic
item.source: How to make money as a non-member?

item.title: How to make money as a non-member?
item.dc:creator: @scipyo scipyo
item.description:
@scipyo wrote:

If you decide to bot yew it won’t get you banned. I botted yews on one of my guys for 60 hours + and nothing wrong.
You have a better chance of getting banned botting rune ess.
If you want to make money using combat though you could kill hill giants when your actually playing and then when you sleep bot.

Hope this helped

Read full topic
item.source: How to make money as a non-member?

item.title: How to make money as a non-member?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Mine iron or coal ore (Iron will be a lot faster), you can chop yews and make good money (But you have a high chance of being banned), you can fish trout and salmon or fish swords or lobs, you rune craft either air or water runes, they’re many ways to make money you just need to be smart.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make money as a non-member?
